schema.description:
Configuration and operational state data for LACP protocol
operation on the aggregate interface

Configuration and operational state data for LACP protocol
operation on the aggregate interface

Configuration and operational state data for LACP protocol
operation on the aggregate interface
Configuration data for each LACP aggregate interface
Configuration data for each LACP aggregate interface
Configuration data for each LACP aggregate interface

Operational state data for each LACP aggregate
interface
Operational state data for aggregate members

aggregation-lacp-members-config.description: Configuration data for lacp member interfaces

aggregation-lacp-members-state.description: Operational status data for the member interfaces

interface.description: Reference to interface member of the LACP aggregate

activity.description: Indicates participant is active or passive

timeout.description:
The timeout type (short or long) used by the
participant

synchronization.description:
Indicates whether the participant is in-sync or
out-of-sync

aggregatable.description:
A true value indicates that the participant will allow
the link to be used as part of the aggregate. A false
value indicates the link should be used as an individual
link

collecting.description:
If true, the participant is collecting incoming frames
on the link, otherwise false

distributing.description:
When true, the participant is distributing outgoing
frames; when false, distribution is disabled

system-id.description:
MAC address that defines the local system ID for the
aggregate interface

oper-key.description:
Current operational value of the key for the aggregate
interface

partner-id.description:
MAC address representing the protocol partner's interface
system ID

partner-key.description: Operational value of the protocol partner's key

port-num.description: Port number of the local (actor) aggregation member

partner-port-num.description:
Port number of the partner (remote) port for this member
port

aggregation-lacp-members-statistics.description: LACP packet statistics for the member interfaces

lacp-rx-errors.description: Number of LACPDU receive packet errors

lacp-tx-errors.description: Number of LACPDU transmit packet errors

lacp-unknown-errors.description: Number of LACPDU unknown packet errors

lacp-errors.description: Number of LACPDU illegal packet errors

aggregation-lacp-members-top.description: Top-level grouping for aggregate members list

members.description:
Enclosing container for the list of members interfaces of
the aggregate. This list is considered operational state
only so is labeled config false and has no config container

member.description:
List of member interfaces and their associated status for
a LACP-controlled aggregate interface.  Member list is not
configurable here -- each interface indicates items
its participation in the LAG.

state.description: Operational state data for aggregate members

lacp-interfaces-config.description: Configuration data for each LACP-enabled interface

name.description:
Reference to the interface on which LACP should be
configured.   The type of the target interface must be
ieee8023adLag

interval.description:
Set the period between LACP messages -- uses
the lacp-period-type enumeration.

lacp-mode.description:
ACTIVE is to initiate the transmission of LACP packets.
PASSIVE is to wait for peer to initiate the transmission of
LACP packets.

system-id-mac.description:
The MAC address portion of the node's System ID. This is
combined with the system priority to construct the 8-octet
system-id

lacp-interfaces-state.description: Operational state data for each LACP-enabled interface

interfaces.description:
Enclosing container for the list of LACP-enabled
interfaces

interface.description: List of aggregate interfaces managed by LACP

config.description: Configuration data for each LACP aggregate interface

state.description:
Operational state data for each LACP aggregate
interface

aggregation-lacp-global-config.description: Configuration data for LACP aggregate interfaces

system-priority.description:
Sytem priority used by the node on this LAG interface.
Lower value is higher priority for determining which node
is the controlling system.

aggregation-lacp-global-state.description: Operational data for LACP aggregate interfaces

aggregation-lacp-top.description:
Top level configuration and state variable containers for
LACP data

lacp.description:
Configuration and operational state data for LACP protocol
operation on the aggregate interface

interfaces_schema.description:
Enclosing container for the list of LACP-enabled
interfaces

interface.description: List of aggregate interfaces managed by LACP

members_schema.description:
Enclosing container for the list of members interfaces of
the aggregate. This list is considered operational state
only so is labeled config false and has no config container

member.description:
List of member interfaces and their associated status for
a LACP-controlled aggregate interface.  Member list is not
configurable here -- each interface indicates items
its participation in the LAG.

state.description: Operational state data for aggregate members
Operational state data for aggregate members

lacp-rx-errors.description: Number of LACPDU receive packet errors

lacp-tx-errors.description: Number of LACPDU transmit packet errors

lacp-unknown-errors.description: Number of LACPDU unknown packet errors

lacp-errors.description: Number of LACPDU illegal packet errors
